mapper.select: SELECT notice_no noticeNo, notice_title noticeTitle FROM notice ORDER BY notice_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT notice_no noticeNo, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent createdate FROM notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( member_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_pw )VALUES( 'goodee', #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, PASSWORD#{noticePw} )
